title: Google Marketing Live 2024: Key Highlights | Torchbox

metadata.description: The spotlight of this year’s Google Marketing Live was, unsurprisingly, on AI and the products Google plans to roll out over the next year. Read our summary of the key takeaways from the talks and what it means for charities.
